astralsorcery.journal.node.WELCOME.name: 欢迎
astralsorcery.journal.WELCOME.1.text: 我们很高兴你能选择星辉学院进行本科魔法学习。你手上的宝典是由学院的讲师为你在学习期间特别准备的学习指南。所有宝典都链接到了我们的星光档案中，会随着你的学习进度自动扩充可用的资料。<NL>如此的教学方法不再需要教授面对面进行教导，
astralsorcery.journal.WELCOME.2.text: 并且你还能自行掌握学习节奏，更好地适应自身的学习需要。<NL>但是，不要误以为你的学习会很轻松。在一众学习机构中，本学院较为注重毕业生的素质，而且你还需要向宝典证明你对星光操纵基本原理有了解，才能获准从星光档案中获得更多的资源倾斜。<NL>愿你学习之路一帆风顺！<NL>——星辉学院全体教职员工。
astralsorcery.journal.node.SHRINES.name: 学院祭坛
astralsorcery.journal.SHRINES.1.text: 某些地域矗立着一些祭坛，学院认为这些地方对于精神方面的研究颇有益处。祭坛一般有两种变体：大型而精致的祭坛，其中内藏有能进行星光操纵的浮动水晶；和较小型的学员祭坛。这两种建筑内都存储有部分学习所必需的物资，当然这些物品也会因这一建筑的上次使用而有所变化。大型的神殿通常位于没有树木遮挡的空旷区域，比如沙漠或者高山顶部。
astralsorcery.journal.SHRINES.2.text: 大型的神殿内含有可以用于聚焦和操纵星光的标准聚集水晶。所有人都能借此对五大“明亮级”的星座之一进行调和共鸣，这对学员的研究有着极大的助益。<NL>这些水晶虽经精雕细琢，纯度却仍差一些火候，因此不要期望它能够提供与那些技术炉火纯青的水晶匠者制作的聚集水晶相同等级的星光量。也因如此，这些水晶无法在性能上更进一步了。
astralsorcery.journal.SHRINES.3.text: 作为公共学习工具，浮动水晶的周围已被设置了特殊的结界，因而学员无法取走或修改它们。这保障了该区域所有学员的能够重复使用这一工具。<NL>本学院提醒所有学员，星光无法穿透不透明的固体物料。当学院需要关闭时会加装屋顶遮蔽，以防止学区受到恶劣天气和敌对生物的影响，如果要使用神殿内部的浮动水晶，记得移除屋顶遮蔽。
astralsorcery.journal.node.CPAPER.name: 星图
astralsorcery.journal.CPAPER.1.text: 在学院祭坛的物资中，你可以找到辅助学习用的羊皮纸。这些羊皮纸与现有的星光档案相匹配，只要你的档案中显示你对星光概念有了充分的理解，羊皮纸就会在你首次查看时揭示出一个额外星座的知识。因此，不会给如何学员生成重复的记录。多余的物资应留给其他学员。
astralsorcery.journal.CPAPER.3.text: 按住 Shift 的同时打开宝典，你便可以将这些星图存储在宝典中，方便以后进行参考。<NL>若有学员因粗心大意而丢失星图，学院将不会重新发放这些资料。不过，可以向其他学员借取一份副本，或者在可以使用更高级的合成祭坛的时候手工重新将星座知识拓印到羊皮纸内。相对于如此重大的过失来说，所需付出的代价可以说是较小的了。学员可以从任意宝典内查看存储的星图。
astralsorcery.journal.node.WAND.name: 共鸣星杖
astralsorcery.journal.WAND.1.text: 多亏了学院的结界，浮动水晶能够自动将星光洒落到附近的合成台上，其他聚集水晶可做不到。然而由于这种行为较为浪费，且在魔法中也显得较为混乱，因此无法用于更精巧的合成上。任何学员的必备工具之一乃是共鸣星杖，该星杖可以通过右键控制星光从星光感应装置中释放，以及合成工具的运作。
astralsorcery.journal.WAND.3.text: 鉴于其对高度凝聚的星能的敏感性，因此可以在晚上用它来测定冲突的星光共振区域。在直面星光之夜，星杖会与区域进行共鸣，星杖的振动说明该区域的地下深处含有§3结晶态§r的星能。<NL>这些区域在地面上看起来如同星光游移而形成的烟雾弥漫区。
astralsorcery.journal.WAND.4.text: 共鸣星杖的最后一个用途，乃是提醒使用者，在某些需求额外支持结构的装置时所出现的不正确之处。由于星光之流的中断，结构中缺失或者错误放置的部分将会被高亮出来，这样就可以让使用者快速进行故障排查了。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ORES.name: 矿物
astralsorcery.journal.ORES.1.text: §8§n水晶石矿石：§r 临近基岩的深极之底，磅礴压力促成了极其稀有且脆弱的晶体。这些晶体的独特的内部结构，使其对于星光有着特殊的接受能力。这些晶体较为脆弱，但它们深藏于坚硬的岩石层脉中，必须用坚固的工具（比如钻石）才能进行开采，否则这些脆弱的晶体将难逃破碎之命运。手持共鸣星杖时能够发现星能于何处发生了共振。
astralsorcery.journal.ORES.2.text: 当靠近这些晶体沉积物时，可以通过发光的异常星能点找到它们进行挖掘。<NL>§9§n海蓝宝石砂岩：§r潺潺清流，将这些沉积于河岸沙滩的水晶碎块细致打磨了一番，而持续的低能星光照射又使其发生了一些反应，最终，便逐步转化形成了这种独特的自然资源。将其用于与星光相关的合成，可谓是恰到好处。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ALTAR1.name: 星辉合成台
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR1.1.text: 星光纯净无暇，可以轻而易举将物质的质料转变为更为有序且纯粹的状态，如此之转变往往是为了切合使用者的些许目的。在学院的祭坛聚集水晶附近放置一个合成台，结界会将星光之流重新定向，然后把合成台转化为适合学员使用的合成工具。这个入门级的合成台由最纯净的大理石构成，可以从天空或与之相连的聚集水晶中快速的吸收星能，并将这种魔法能量重定向到放置在其内的合成材料中。如此一来，就不必依赖那在魔法上较为混乱的能量洪流了。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR1.2.text: 想要让它能捕捉星光，你得将其放置在露天的环境中。另外，它也缺少聚集水晶中的那种能够高效收集星光的矩阵，因此它无法完全补足星能向环境中的散逸量。学院的测量结果表明，海平面高度大致是逸散损失的中间点，在基岩层时星能几乎完全逸散了，而环境散逸现象会在基岩层向上两个海平面高度的地方完全消失。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR1.4.text: 如果合成台的位置高于散逸高度，或通过其他方式让其突破散逸高度，这种行为并不可行，我们建议将合成台重新放置到其他正常的位置上。自天向地，星能的分布并不总是均匀无差，部分地区的星能高度汇聚，可用星能的量远超其他地区。值得庆幸的是，星能的总量不会会因这种鲁莽的行为而匮乏，并且在目前所有已知地区，调查组未曾发现有大范围的绝星能区。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR1.5.text: 在合成台上摆放后制作配方原料的物品后，用共鸣星杖右键单击引导合成台内储存的星能，使其充分与原材料结合。当物品制作完成后会自动从合成台内弹出。当前合成台所储存的星能会显示在合成台界面的下方。由于星能的逸散性，其会以波动状态增减。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR1.6.text: 这种储存功能不同于那种随时间而充能的电池，而是反映出当前环境中可用于合成的星光量。除了最简单的设备，工具和材料处理之外，其余合成所需要的星光量都超过了这个工作台能够安全引导以及储存的上限量。<NL>一旦学员利用了此工作台制作出了学习中的必要器具，他们便会获得许多关于星光概念的知识，这些知识可用于进一步晋升该工作台，使其效率大增。
astralsorcery.journal.MARBLETYPES.1.text: 星术师需要的是一种特别纯净的特种大理石。这种大理石天然质朴，且能高度反射魔法能量，你可以在地下的洞穴中找到这种大理石。那些低魔法纯度的大理石完全无法用于精细的能量操纵，而这是在星光控制中不可或缺的。以特定的雕琢方式雕琢大理石，可以改变大理石引导附近星光的方式。<NL>
astralsorcery.journal.MARBLETYPES.2.text: 虽然学院的公共神殿以及学员聚集区内使用的正是这种大理石，但学院在此郑重告诫所有学员，盗窃或破坏学院公共财产大理石的将受到院级处分，严重者甚至将被开除出学院。
astralsorcery.journal.SOOTYMARBLE.1.text: 把一些魔法滤层元素（比如煤粉）作为大理石的表面涂层，可以改变大理石的性质，而不仅仅是使其变得“脏”。特殊的共振方式已经从根本上改变了大理石的性质，因此即使洗去煤粉也无法改变大理石新的外观与功能，以及对魔法能量的吸收和表层反射的性质。
astralsorcery.journal.SOOTYMARBLE.2.text: 这在引导大量星光时十分有用，因为在使用聚集装置从星光源头处吸收星光时，有极大可能吸收到星光中的能量杂质，而熏黑大理石可以纯化这些杂质。
astralsorcery.journal.HAND_TELESCOPE.1.t: 星轮转动，夜夜不息，但众星仍然有着固定的出现位置。对于那些魔法能量敏感者而言，则能感应到某些重复出现的图案与形状中蕴含的特殊能量。这些奇特的星座有着自身的运动规律，这与月相有着联系。观察者可以使用一种特制的玻璃镜片对星座进行更清楚的观测。这种由特制镜片制成的望远镜虽是最基础的观测设备，但它仍能提高你对星空的观测效率，
astralsorcery.journal.HAND_TELESCOPE.4.t: 不过由于星座间能量的涨落与流动，望远镜每晚只能对一个星座进行观测。<NL>观测时必须保证周围没有任何的障碍物，并且要发现过对应星座的星图才行。更重要的是，当你发现了星座需要进行绘制时，你得按住 shift 固定望远镜，然后用左键对星座的图案进行详细的测绘。
astralsorcery.journal.HAND_TELESCOPE.5.t: 如果没有对望远镜进行固定，或没有准确的绘制出星座的话，这些魔法图案就没有被真正的§3发现§r。一旦完成了星座的绘制，它将永久固化在脑海里，星座中的强大能量能让你从此以后再也无需任何设备就能在夜空中看到它。
astralsorcery.journal.ILLUM_POWDER.1.tex: 荧石也能对星能作出反应，即使是较少量的荧石也能与海蓝宝石发生共振。把海蓝宝石与荧石捣碎为粉，其自身便会产生剧烈的高能反应。将这种粉末扔出会在空间中形成一个光源。<NL>由于这一光源其实就是一团漂浮的尘云，所以它可比火把难熄灭多了，想要消除这些光源，只能用用液体或方块对其进行覆盖。
astralsorcery.journal.NOC_POWDER.1.text: 虽然暗室是一般情况下强制怪物生成并收割它们身上贵重器官的正常方式，但暗室除了需要保证无光，还需要对其中的诸多布置进行详细考量。<NL>通过利用辉光粉内的星能与其他活性成分来产生抑光区域，这就制作出了一个可投掷的，生成临时的黑暗云区域的粉末，
astralsorcery.journal.NOC_POWDER.3.text: 该区域会在短时间内根据生物群系的反应生成相应的怪物，无论它们是如何的稀有少见。<NL>这片区域不会影响阳光对怪物的净化效果，因此应注意不要赶走或过早击杀其中的一些怪物。<NL>将多个云区放置的太近或太频繁的在同一个位置释放，会降低怪物的生成几率。无论是由你自己还是投掷器扔出的。
astralsorcery.journal.ILLUMINATOR.1.text: 辉光粉无法应付大范围的区域照明问题。这不仅仅是需要手动部署的问题，还需要星术师亲身进入危险区域。使用由星光进行供能的设备来部署光源，可谓是又快又好。<NL>通过吸收夜间的聚能场，或使用学识更深的受教者制作的照明星杖为装置供能，洞穴照明器可以在 8 米范围的螺旋形垂直层中提供广阔的照明范围。
astralsorcery.journal.ILLUMINATOR.3.text: 为了防止光源过多的问题，洞穴照明器只会在其下方的洞穴区域放置光源。如果有足够的时间，它将一直照亮到基岩层，并将继续在新出现的空白区域放置光源。<NL>拆除洞穴照明器时光源会被保留。由于清除光源需要花费不少的力气，因此放置时请注意，以免照亮不需要的区域。
astralsorcery.journal.ROCK_CRYSTALS.1.te: 由于它们的产生环境较为特殊，所以每枚新开采的水晶石都各有不同。每枚水晶石在尺寸、纯度与可塑性上的差异，都会导致他们在特定目的的适用性上产生相当大的差异。在把它们从岩石层中挖掘出来前，没有办法确定这些水晶石的具体属性。虽然学院早已认知到对水晶石的处理是利用水晶石的必经之路，但这可不像给一个普通宝石整容那么简单。
astralsorcery.journal.ROCK_CRYSTALS.2.te: 将水晶石用磨石粗暴的打磨只会造成破坏。因此需要用更精致的方式对水晶进行§8处理§r。
astralsorcery.journal.CRYSTAL_GROWTH.1.t: 水晶石会受到浓缩星光中的魔法能量的影响，进而发生内部矩阵的强化重排，所以将水晶石浸没在星光液并等待其将星光液完全吸收掉，可以将其修复或者变得更坚固耐用。当吸收完毕后，水晶石的尺寸将增长。任何水晶石的属性与属性数量的增幅都有其极限，同时，若不使用专用工具，是无法删除水晶石上的属性的。
astralsorcery.journal.CRYSTAL_GROWTH.2.t: 将两个晶体浸入星光液中会导致属性较少的水晶石被合并到具有更多属性的水晶石中，“较大”的水晶石可能获得被吸收的水晶石的一个或多个属性。水晶石拥有的属性越多，发生这种情况的可能性就越小。
astralsorcery.journal.CUTTING_TOOL.1.tex: 学院的文献表明，虽然铁或钢凿子用起来还算顺手，但这种“顺手”只能是停留在物理层面上，星光的引导则依赖于工具魔法层面的能力。星辉锭的坚硬和其自带的辐射魔法场域，可以同时满足切削工具对物理和魔法层面的双重需求。金则可以防止工具凿头的魔法场域发生变形，从而进一步增强了工具性能。<NL>对工具进行附魔将获得更好的保护，以防在使用中产生负面影响。
astralsorcery.journal.CUTTING_TOOL.3.tex: 用工具敲击水晶石，可以分割水晶石以及其属性。新生成的水晶石将各自继承其父代属性的一部分，但这个过程既不均匀也不完美。有时还会导致部分属性消失。<NL>将水晶石和雕凿出的碎片反复浸没在星光液中，再花费些时间，便可以塑造出一个特定用途的水晶石，当然，这需要一些§5运气§r才行。
astralsorcery.journal.node.TOOLS.name: 水晶石工具
astralsorcery.journal.TOOLS.1.text: 水晶石不耐剪切，但若小心操作，如此制成的水晶石工具在导引背景星能时的性能要远远优于金属工具。在使用数个水晶石专门制作的普通工具导引背景星能时，可以充分地利用其组成的水晶石所具有的属性并完美发挥出来。用这种方式制作的工具将拥有独特的作用，即使是同一为制作者所制造的工具也有可能因为所使用的水晶石而拥有完全不同的强度与能力。
astralsorcery.journal.TOOLS.3.text: 若将受损的水晶石工具浸没到星光液中，那么当工具将星光液完全吸收之后，它们的耐久便会随之恢复。<NL>那些学识更丰富的学员甚至可以找到在使用过程中为这些工具提供外部星能的方法，来进一步增强它们的功能，或以其他的方式利用它们的属性。
astralsorcery.journal.node.WELL.name: 聚星缸
astralsorcery.journal.WELL.1.text: 水晶石周围会自然而然的聚集星光，将其放置在高浓度的星光下时，其周围会生成露珠状的星辉凝结液。这种星光液对于魔法研究上有极大的助益，但正常情况下是无法收集海蓝宝石或水晶石周围自然凝结的微量液体的。你必须使用一种特殊的引导容器——聚星缸——来快速且稳定的收集并储存星光液。照耀于聚星缸的星光越多，它利用催化剂产生星光液的速度也就越快。
astralsorcery.journal.WELL.3.text: 鼠标右击将催化剂放入聚星缸后，催化剂将无法取下。催化剂将被其所引导收束的星光之力缓慢降解，并不断生成星光液，直到它完全分解为止。虽然催化剂的使用寿命都不同，但越大份量的催化剂产生的液体越多，其寿命也越长。对星能敏感的海蓝宝石和水晶石可以产生星光液，但是其他催化剂也可以产生其他液体，比如用下界岩产生熔岩。
astralsorcery.journal.WELL.4.text: 由于其独特的构造限制，即使有外部的星能源进行供能，聚星缸正上方的位置也必须保持露天。从聚星缸的底部可以用抽取液体的泵或管道来提前液体，但无法将液体回流到聚星缸内。<NL>催化剂对星光的感应越强，它产生的液体就越多。水晶石就比海蓝宝石要产生更多的星光液，以更高级的方式强化过的催化剂，能够比其基础形式产生更多的产物。
astralsorcery.journal.WELL.5.text: 星光液在星光合成外也有其他的用途。它的流动速度比水更快，触碰它会获得暂时的夜视能力，它也与其他液体发生交互作用。这种超冷流体会立即冻结与之接触的所有水，并迅速冷却流动的熔岩，以至于形成的是沙子而不是石头。<NL>有时形成的沙子会受环境中的过量星光影响，生成的是海蓝宝石砂岩。
astralsorcery.journal.INFUSED_WOOD.1.tex: 作为一种纤维材料，将木材浸泡在星光液中会让星光液被吸入纤维中，使木材浸透并加大其强度。<NL>新产生的这种材料坚韧且富有弹性，特别适合用于引导魔法能量。如果需要进一步提升聚星木的魔法感应度，可以将其放到拥有星光感受能力的合成台上进行进一步加工。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ALTAR2.name: 星辉祭坛
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR2.1.text: 所有学员的下一个测试都是升级他的星辉合成台，升级过后的工作台便可以操纵外部的星能，此步骤乃是进一步操纵星光之魔力的必经之路，极为重要。只需对星辉合成台稍加改造，再辅以些许魔力增强过大理石，引导操纵魔法能量两倍于从前，并不是什么遥不可及的痴梦。<NL>§b升级之后§r的合成台自然也许要新的支持结构，否则新多出来的星光储存量将无法得到有效利用。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR2.4.text: 虽然拥有两倍于星辉合成台的星光储存量是不错，但是祭坛的另一个重要特征是需要完整的结构，如果周围的结构不完整，那么祭坛内部的储存槽将显示为§4红色§r。<NL>如果有足够的星光，并且有足够的原料同时摆放在祭坛上，那么祭坛可以同时制作多个物品。祭坛储存槽越大，它的合成速度就越快。
astralsorcery.journal.node.SKY_RESO.name: 能量汇聚
astralsorcery.journal.SKY_RESO.1.text: 特定星座所散逸出的魔法能量有其独特的频率。频率之差会在星术师在操纵特定能量时起大作用，而有些时候，星术师并不在意操纵的能量来自何方，有就行了。好在，百川汇海，万流归宗，星座的魔能也不例外。这片魔能汇聚的海洋被称为法斯刻之域，天域星座之魔能垂落于此处，充盈欲滴。
astralsorcery.journal.SKY_RESO.2.text: 无论是进行研究还是能量引导，从未有星术师能够窥探到法斯刻之域的原生能量极限。未学习过相关知识的学员要查看所在位置的星能场能量程度，可以使用星辉合成台内的储存库进行手动测量，这需要带着星辉合成台进行移动。<NL>虽然这个方法的确有效，但效率太低，而且有可能碰上怪物。
astralsorcery.journal.SKY_RESO.3.text: 使用直接显示原生法斯刻之域的装置同样效率甚低，这就如同在海里游泳时寻找水一样。<NL>因此，我们建议仅制造对最高浓度的法斯刻之域产生反应的装置。在夜间时将法斯刻共振器举到高处，可以找到法斯刻浓缩最高的区域，就像共鸣星杖与水晶石矿石那样。罕见的蓝色云层表明当前区域含有大量星能，而这些云中的星芒表明了该区域内星能浓度最高的地方。
astralsorcery.journal.SPEC_RELAY.1.text: 虽然法斯刻共振器可以用于找寻高法斯刻浓度区域，但估计没有学员想（或者不能）将基础设施迁移到那儿，来利用这些星光浓郁的区域。而同时学员也无法制作自己的聚集水晶，因此扩展星辉祭坛的聚集范围就是唯一的选择了。
astralsorcery.journal.SPEC_RELAY.4.text: 利用小型的大理石结构，可以将附近的法斯刻能量引导到光波增幅器中，如此便形成一个良好的法斯刻聚集点。右击将玻璃透镜插入光波增幅器内，便可为收集到的能量提供一个出口。基于光波增幅器的特性，所有距离 16 米内的星光合成装置都将获得额外的法斯刻能量供应。附近的任何人都能观测到能量传输的过程。
astralsorcery.journal.TELESCOPE.1.text: 望远镜对于学员来说是个不错的辅助工具，但由于构造的限制，其有着相当大的局限性。一个更稳定的底座和额外的金色装饰将可以调整和消除冲突的星座光谱，并且每晚都可以对当晚天空中的所有星座进行观测。额外增加的稳定性将能使你探测暗淡的星座，明亮级也当然不在话下。
astralsorcery.journal.TELESCOPE.3.text: 与它的组成部件望远镜一样，天文望远镜也要求在露天环境下，而且周围不能有任何障碍物。<NL>使用观察窗左右两侧的箭头可以将其视角转向天空中出现的 8 个星座之一。如果测绘时出现错误，或者在测绘时没有精确的对准星座的星星，你可以调整下镜头的朝向，重新进行星座测绘。
学院支持学员之间的知识分享行为，因为共享你的知识与研究会让所有人受益。由于星光知识的神秘特性，只有使用一种置入星光反应花纹的卷轴，方可拓展使用者的知识，如此的卷轴会让使用者如同亲身经历了这些发现一般。右键单击可以将知识置入到卷轴中或从卷轴中学习，或者用Shift +右击以覆盖卷轴内的知识。
astralsorcery.journal.node.LENS.name: 水晶透镜
astralsorcery.journal.LENS.1.text: 对所有星术师来说，操纵与沿特定路径聚集星光的能力十分重要。无论是提高聚星缸中催化剂的转化效率，还是提高星辉祭坛的星光可用量，抑或是仅仅只是进行材料转换，有时星光源距离过远，或者某片区域的星光供小于求，等等。这些都是对星术师能力的考验。<NL>在这些情况下，水晶透镜是最佳解决方案。
astralsorcery.journal.LENS.3.text: 在选择用于制作水晶透镜的水晶石时，学院建议使用最高品质的进行制作，一旦水晶石中含有的任何瑕疵或缺陷，都会影响之后制作的水晶透镜。而这又反而会导致它们在传输星能时造成更大的损耗。使用质量上乘的天体水晶石进行星光折射传输不会产生额外的损耗。
astralsorcery.journal.LENS.4.text: 在魔法星光的法则限制下，一个水晶透镜可以一次性从多个来源和多个角度接收星能，但它只能将这些星光一次性传输到一个位置上。水晶透镜的基座使其可以放在方块的所有面上，可谓方便至极。<NL>当水晶透镜将星光聚集到目标时，使用链接器调整好水晶透镜的距离与角度，这是准确传输星能的重要一步。
astralsorcery.journal.node.LINKTOOL.name: 链接器
astralsorcery.journal.LINKTOOL.1.text: 没有辅助工具的情况下，魔法能量可不像物理世界那样容易控制。学院的链接器是任何星术师操纵星光的主要工具之一。利用海蓝宝石的魔法特性将聚集水晶的能量导引到目标方块上，可以在两个位置之间形成法则意义上的联系，从而进行星光的传输。先右击起始源头，将位置存储在链接器内，之后所有被右击的选定目标，都将链接至刚刚你所选定的源头。
astralsorcery.journal.LINKTOOL.3.text: 若将目标位置替换为其他方块，此时无需重新链接源头与目标。用其他方块阻挡聚集水晶的星光束传导并不会使得聚集水晶停止传输星光，由于无法将星光聚焦至目标的位置，所以它只是在白白消耗自己收集的星光而已。将一个源头链接到多个目标将均分星光，因此把多余的链路删除也很重要。要删除单个链接，先选择星光源，之后按住 shift 时右击目标位置即会中断链接。
astralsorcery.journal.LINKTOOL.4.text: 要一次性删除所有链接，按住 shift 时右键星光源即可。当链接器不再作为活动工具时，它将断开与选定源的连接，从而能进行新源的选定。链接器内的源信息会在跨越维度时丢失。<NL>任何需要消耗星能的装置都可以链接到聚集水晶来增大星能输入。长距离的链接不需要加载也能继续传输星能。
将大量的星能聚集到一个位置上，可以对物质进行重构。这也可以用于需要大量星光的星辉祭坛或效应放大仪式。与星辉祭坛不同的是，效应放大仪式只能接收与其内的星座一致的星光。
astralsorcery.journal.TRANSMUTATION_ORES: 许多物质都对星光有着很高的活性反应，将星光聚焦其上时会发生奇妙的转变。将星光聚集水晶链接到方块上，就能改变其组成构造。<NL>这其中最有用的就是制作星辉矿石了，但除此之外学院也记录了其他的转化，比如沙子变粘土，钻石矿变绿宝石矿，南瓜变蛋糕等。此页面的图标将循环显示源方块。
astralsorcery.journal.STARMETAL_ORE.1.te: 星辉锭是任何星术师都需要的最重要的金属之一，但它并非自然生成的。为铁矿石注入大量的星光，迫使其晶体结构重组，就像制造磁铁一样。这种魔法矿石可以像铁一样熔炼成星辉金属锭，这种锭会不断的散发出微弱的星光魔法场，这对于高级学员而言有着诸多的用途。
astralsorcery.journal.node.STARDUST.name: 星尘
astralsorcery.journal.STARDUST.1.text: 虽然星辉金属在导引星光上有广泛的应用，但比起用星辉锭制作的星尘来还是有不小的差距。金属内蕴含的强大星能，让金属兼具了刚性和韧性。虽然它可以直接承受冲击而不产生形变，但若是尝试对金属进行研磨或切割会让金属变得像面团一样变形。因此必须抑制金属内的魔法能量才能制作星尘，学院的星辉锭切削工具就是为此而准备的。
astralsorcery.journal.STARDUST.2.text: 用切削工具快速敲击一个星辉金属锭，对物理形体与星能量场的强烈冲击导致其失去稳性，迅速破碎为星尘。<NL>这一操作对速度与力量有着不一般的要求，而在合成台无法进行这样的操作，因此必须在世界中完成。这项技能在今后的学习中会频繁的使用，你应当多加练习。
astralsorcery.journal.RESONATOR_AREA_SIZ: 在法斯刻之域内搜寻高浓度星能场是有用的，但对于部分学员来说，查看星能的适应范围也是刚需。在法斯刻共振器上添加特殊的玻璃透镜、辉光粉和星尘，右键点击仪式基座时将显示自然星能场受干扰的范围。<NL>Shift右键将使共振器在法斯刻和多米刻模式间循环切换。
只有少数星术师能够再家旁边找到所有他需要的资源，绝大多数星术师为了原生的水晶石，法斯刻之域等必须之物而奔波在外，甚至他们还要进入其他的维度去寻找材料。因此，即便是学院的学员也迫切需要有一个安全可靠的，可以不断扩展规模的旅行方式。天体星门网络便是较好的选择，天体星门甚至让跨维度旅行也变得十分简单，并且星门本身可以使用铁砧命名。
站在星门上是可以看到处于别的维度的星门的，不同的星门将像星星一样显化在闪烁的虚空中。星门的位置是相对的，其他维度的星门将显示在更高的位置。选定星门后按住shift或右键单击将进行传送。<NL>同一区域内的星门过多会导致某些星门无法显示。你可以使用铁砧命名星门，这样可以将目的地的名字写在上面，或者你也可以使用染料为目的地的星星换一种颜色。
让一些外人不受限制地进入敏感地区，这种行为十分危险。你可以使用海蓝宝石右击天体星门，将星门设置为私有，若想移除私有限制只要空手右击即可。若想扩展访问权限，只需使用链接器将私有星门与玩家相互链接即可。<NL>站在私有星门上时，外圈的白色大理石上会显示所有访问者的名字与个人星座。右击相应的个人星座会取消对应玩家的访问权限。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ALTAR3.name: 天辉祭坛
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR3.1.text: 基于星尘特有的引光特性，你可以对星辉祭坛进行再度改进强化。向现有的祭坛额外添加一些海蓝宝石、大理石，以及另一种用星辉锭与星尘改进的天体水晶，这对祭坛的提升远非先前能比。<NL>完成这一步后证明学员的研究进入了下一个维度，并且下一步所需的学习资源也将开放使用。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR3.4.text: 祭坛升级后拥有更强大的引导力，这导致现有的支持结构无法提供足够的星光，必须使用更多的熏黑大理石以及更庞大的支持结构。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PLAYER.1.text: 对于常规合成来说，使用全频谱的星光便已足够，但在特定的使用中，将星光过滤并限制于特定星座，要比直接使用全频谱星光的效率高得多。优秀的星术师深知，从特定星座而来的魔法效果使用价值很高，并且他们能够熟练的将这些魔法效果应用于之后学院的关键性研究中。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PLAYER.2.text: 那些过滤掉无用星光频段的结构，无一不是庞然大物，非得占用大片的地域才行。熏黑大理石的吸收性质于此处有了大用，利用它，便可以将那些不需要的星光吸入大理石中，将其与我们需要的魔法图形隔离。在熏黑大理石上放置光波增幅器，即可将被吸入大理石中的星光重新引出，这种方式不像传统的的大理石重定向星光，因为其没有一丝一毫对星光的浪费。从这个角度出发，实际上，整个祭坛是作为星光的中继器而存在的。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PLAYER.4.text: 将光波增幅器阵列按照星座的外观依次排开，即可将星座的魔法图形锁于祭坛之上，如此一来，祭坛的中心聚焦点便可将放置在其上的物品与星座的魔法频率发生共振。祭坛的巨大熏黑大理石基底，内部蕴藏着浓缩的能量，当你于夜间手持星图时，这个能量便会作出反应，在大理石上显示出图中星座对应的正确增幅器摆放位置。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PLAYER.6.text: 当增幅器放置在了可以正确过滤已收集星光的位置上时，你便可以看到一道道蓝色的星光束流在大理石表面不断流动，最终勾勒出了星座的图案。无论是什么（或者是谁），只要位于共鸣祭坛的中心，就会被那喷涌的、已过滤的星能轰隆淹没。这会强制将目标现有的内部能量共鸣为你所选中的星座。<NL>只有那些经历过共鸣的学员方可认知到除 5 个明亮级别以外的星座。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERKS.1.text: 与星能共鸣并将星能贮存于体内，如此可以直接增强共鸣之人的能力，就如同水晶石一般。虽然只需正确的聚焦星光，便可通过星光的魔法能力初步达到增强自身的目的，但若想完全达到你的目标，初始的能力选择便十分重要了，因为它会影响到你后续还需付出多少的努力去完成你的目标，亦即，你还需要做多少必要的共鸣能量的行为"锻炼"，才能达到目标。<NL>你只能与明亮级的星座进行共鸣。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERKS.2.text: 控制这些内在魔法能量的引导方式，需要学员不断地进行冥想，而这超出了绝大多数星术师的能力范围，这是因为这一能力与你的手上功夫没有多大的关系。为了帮助学员更好的进行学习，学员在宝典内收录了冥想工具页面，它可以帮助你以可视化的形态进行冥想，并且还能帮助你分配剩余的能量点数。<NL>这些工具都放置在宝典内的"星能力"标签内。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERKS.3.text: 以不同的方式使用这些魔法能量点数将导致不同的结果。可惜的是，由于星座的整个图案已经被铭刻到了个人的魔法形态中，所以不存在有某种可以简单的将某个单独的，已分配的点数恢复为未分配状态的方法，虽然有一些方式可以对技能进行封禁（本书后面有详细说明）。要清除已分配的点数，必须从其根本开始，打断与星座的共鸣能量。将共鸣打断后需要重新与星座进行共鸣，并且星能力也需要重新锻炼。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERKS.4.text: 内部星能一共有三种级别的强化。<NL>加值/减值 -在基础值上增加一个固定值。<NL>增长/减少 -先将所有的增长值和减少值进行求和，然后在进行增值/减值之后，再将求和得数应用到其上。<NL>叠增/叠减 -这些值不进行求和，而是在增长/减少的值应用后再应用本值。
astralsorcery.journal.SHIFT_STAR.1.text: 通过共鸣得到的星能力是无法轻易消除的，早期的解决方式就是使用更替之星来中断共鸣。这种人造晶体产生的振频可以破坏掉使用者与星座之间的共鸣，将其拿在手中时，长按右键一段时间，它就会破碎消失，并抹除你的星座共鸣。<NL>这种抹除方式会废除掉之前所有的努力，并且需要重新进行星座共鸣。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERKS_SEAL.1.t: 有时可能有部分能力是你不需要的，但又必须经由此能力获得更深入的进阶能力，或者可能是偶尔需要该能力。与其使用更替之星来打断与重置所有技能，不如直接在身上使用封禁印章来封禁单个能力，这样不会对其他能力造成影响。你可以直接将背包内的封禁印章拖动到星能力树的星能力上，松开后，封禁印章将刻入到你的身体上，它将覆盖技能的共振频率。双击封禁印章将破坏封印。封禁印章的使用数量没有限制。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERK_GEMS.1.te: Rock Crystals and their derivatives are exceptional at gathering Starlight, but are like a sieve when it comes to storing it. By doping the exterior of a crystal to serve as an internally-facing mirror, the residual effects of Starlight can be captured, though the light drains away. <NL>Throwing a Rock Crystal into a bucket of Liquid Starlight with Illumination Powder will result in a reaction with the crystal, eventually evaporating both the Liquid Starlight and the Illumination Powder and leaving behind a small crystal cluster.
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERK_GEMS.2.te: Once it has slowly grown through several stages into a larger cluster, it can be harvested. The resulting Gem is reactive to local Starlight energies, generating eddy currents that modify Attuned energies in their wielder that can be felt when held. The time of day the cluster grows can impact the type of crystal that forms - Day, Night, or during Dawn and Dusk. The time of growth will change the type of gem created, and gems that advance a growth-stage during the day will tend to have weaker, though more numerous enhancements, than at night. Once fully grown, these clusters may shift based on time of day until harvested.
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERK_GEMS.3.te: Harvested Gem enhancements vary from two to four in number. <NL>To benefit from one or more of these gems, a Gem Socket perk will need to be allocated. These special Attunement locations are receptive to the currents created by these gems. <NL>Once allocated, selecting the Socket will allow the Attuned to select a Gem in their inventory, gaining its enhancements as it is temporarily absorbed into their form. Removing the Gem from its Socket will return it to inventory, where it can be replaced with another if desired, or the socket left empty.
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_CRYSTAL.1.text: An important step towards crafting Starlight collecting crystals, attuning a crystal to a constellation's magical frequency allows it to discard the magical light of any other constellation, much like a goose sheds water from its back. <NL>While this resultant magically attuned rock can be used to greatly improve the distillation of Liquid Starlight from a lightwell when used as a catalyst, an attuned crystal is merely an intermediary material until further refined by a more skilled initiate.
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_CRYSTAL.2.text: Attuned crystals may still be worked with a Starmetal Cutting Tool as any other crystal, but the likelihood that the attunement will survive the process for all shards created is unlikely. <NL>Once attuned, a crystal cannot have its attunement changed to another without catastrophic results to the integrity of the crystal, and the standard attunement altar has safeguards created by the Academy in its design to prevent such an action.
astralsorcery.journal.RIT_PEDESTAL.1.tex: The magical power of starlight can have a directly magical effect on the local area if sufficiently gathered and filtered. By placing an Attuned crystal into a Ritual Pedestal, magical light from only one constellation will be passed into the device, creating a magical effect as it resonates with the crystal inside the pedestal's heart. As a constellation's starlight is greatly diminished while not overhead in the sky, feeding the pedestal with additional gathered starlight of the same constellation will greatly improve its power.
astralsorcery.journal.PED_ACCEL.1.text: Ritual Pedestals are not as effective as a Collector Crystal at gathering Starlight. Linking a Collector Crystal to the Pedestal will see increased speed of the ritual, as long as the light isn't from a constellation being blocked by the filtering Attuned Crystal in the pedestal. Due to how rituals operate, this additional Starlight does not directly feed the magical ritual itself, but does provide additional magical energy to be manipulated by the pedestal.
astralsorcery.journal.PED_ACCEL.2.text: As the energy being provided to a ritual increases, balancing the ritual will need to be performed to increase its speed. Beams of starlight will be sent from the pedestal where there is an imbalance, and a Crystal Lens should placed at the terminus of each of these beams and linked to the pedestal to balance the magical energy flow. This will require a maximum of five reflections, at which time the ritual will be fully balanced, no matter how much more Starlight is provided.
astralsorcery.journal.PED_ACCEL.3.text: A ritual's operation speed is dependent on how much Starlight energy is being provided. The placement of these balancing lenses will not need to change if the Attuned Crystal in the pedestal is removed or exchanged, unless the constellation of the Attunement also changes. <NL>If an Anchor is present, the pedestal will automatically mirror the energy balance to the anchor from any Crystal Lenses present.
astralsorcery.journal.PED_ACCEL.4.text: While the Academy has been unable to measure a maximum speed of operation for any ritual, the Attuned Crystal in the pedestal definitely has limits. Continuing to accelerate the operation speed of a ritual once it is fully balanced may cause stress Fracturing of the Attuned Crystal, risking parts of the crystal breaking off and reducing attributes.
astralsorcery.journal.QUICK_CHARGE.1.tex: More learned initiates understand that Starlight energies suffuse more than blocks and pool more places than Fosic Fields. All things contain some Starlight energy of at least one constellation, including the bodies of prospective Sorcerers. <NL>Charge can be used to fuel implements designed to channel this power source. While the Charge cost will vary based on the magic used, the channeler will be able to determine how much of their internal reservoir will be expended when considering the scale of the effect.
astralsorcery.journal.QUICK_CHARGE.2.tex: While this reservoir starts small, it will refill on its own from the nearby environment, allowing for continuous use of charge-requiring tools when the use is spread out, especially if under the night sky. <NL>Some effects may require more charge than can be held at once, and §1Attuning§r oneself to the constellations may be needed to expand this internal reservoir, or even impact how quickly the charge can recover.
astralsorcery.journal.TOOL_CHANNEL.1.tex: While the Academy has seen no indication that directly channeling Starlight Charge to affect the world by any Sorcerer is possible, utilizing specially crafted implements makes it easy for using this magical energy to create magical effects by almost any initiate. Common uses include creating Illumination Sparks from an Illumination Wand, empowering Crystal Tools, launching through the air, or even by graduated sorcerers bolstering their magic Mantles. Many initiates find the most helpful use of this Charge is when building out the many structures needed to progress
astralsorcery.journal.TOOL_CHANNEL.2.tex: their studies with two specialized wands: the Conversion Wand, and the Formation Wand.
astralsorcery.journal.TRAVERSAL_WAND.1.t: 越空星杖有两种使用方式。冲驰模式下可以使用星杖进行蓄力，释放时会向视角朝向方向释放蓄力相同力度的冲刺。在闪现模式下，激活后星杖会直接将你传送到目标位置。但需要注意的是，仔细查看目标附近的环境，避免掉入深渊。
astralsorcery.journal.GRAPPLE_WAND.1.tex: 冲击星杖就是魔法版的钩爪，向目标位置发射一束星能魔法束。一旦与目标连接成功，它将阻止使用者的任何现有移动，并将其立刻拉到目标位置。该星杖具有内部充能设置，需要充能后才能再次使用，除非进行额外的再充能。
astralsorcery.journal.TOOL_WANDS.1.text: For both the Conversion and Formation wands, shift-right-clicking a block will configure the block they will use from the wielder's inventory to enact their magical effect.<NL>Conversion wands can be shift-right-clicked in the air to alter the size of the area they will replace when used. Multiple blocks may be set at once, which will generate a random pattern of all selected blocks when activating this wand, if sufficient blocks are in the user's inventory.
astralsorcery.journal.TOOL_WANDS.3.text: Formation wands have multiple placement modes they operate in, with the default mode being a line placed orthogonally from the targeted block face back to the wielder's position. Additional modes include building a direct line from the wielder to the targeted face, placing a horizontal plane of blocks at the targeted location, placing a vertical plane of blocks at the targeted location, or spheres that are either solid or hollow. These sizes are fixed. <NL>Botanical mages can leverage mana through their own rods to supply blocks for these wands directly.
astralsorcery.journal.LENSES_EFFECTS.1.t: Filtration of Starlight magic is accomplished by Constellation Attunement, but filtering the energy isn't the only way to change it's magical effects. By using aligned ingredients to dope a glass lens, starlight passed through the lens will be twisted to only a specific aspect of the light, regardless of which constellation to which it belongs. <NL>Because this light is not limited to a specific constellation, explicit focus of the energy does not matter, and simply being bathed in the light will see a magical effect applied.
astralsorcery.journal.LENSES_EFFECTS.2.t: Affixing one of these colored lenses to a Crystal Lens array will filter any light sent through it. Unfortunately, shifting the spectrum of the magical energy with one of these lenses will not persist through another lens or prism, which will correct the magical frequency shift and bring it back into "true". If the effect is desired through multiple crystal lenses in a chain, a colored lens would need to be applied to each Crystal Lens in the chain.
astralsorcery.journal.IGNITION_LENS.1.te: The beam from an Ignition Lens sets things on fire. Creatures will burn under the flames, items dropped into the beam and blocks placed in its path are treated as though subjected to a furnace. <NL>The rate of ignition is based on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
astralsorcery.journal.BREAK_LENS.1.text: The beam of a Break Lens breaks any blocks placed into its path, except those that cannot be broken such as Illuminated blocks or bedrock. <NL>How quickly a placed block is brokenis based on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
astralsorcery.journal.DAMAGE_LENS.1.text: Creatures in the beam from a Harm Lens will periodically take damage as through struck by a sword. <NL>The frequency of the damage is based on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
astralsorcery.journal.PUSH_LENS.1.text: The beam of a Push Lens applies a constant force away from the lens to both items and creatures in its path. Ice can accelerate how quickly an affected object or creature is moved. <NL>The frequency of the pushing effect is based on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
The beam of a Regeneration Lens encourages rapid regeneration of injuries. <NL>How frequently the regeneration is applied is based on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
astralsorcery.journal.GROWTH_LENS.1.text: The beam from a Growth lens subjects any plants in its path to rapid growth, as though by bonemeal or any other method the plant would normally grow. <NL>How often a plant is forced to grow is based on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
astralsorcery.journal.SPECTRAL_LENS.1.te: There are times when operating under an open sky aren't possible, and the safety of the underground or behind a closed door is needed. Starlight transmission through glass can solve some of these problems, but sometimes this is not possible. The modulation of a Spectral Lens allows collected starlight to transmit through solid blocks, though there are losses to the total transmission at the receiving end.
astralsorcery.journal.node.INFUSER.name: 星光聚合器
astralsorcery.journal.INFUSER.1.text: Increasing the reactivity of materials to Starlight energy is necessary in many cases. The Academy recognizes only a few materials that are receptive to simply submerging them into Liquid Starlight. Forced Infusion is needed to transmute many objects into what the Academy considers their more "natural" states than applying radiation directly allows. This is more temperamental than Attunement or Starlight Transmutation. Liquid Starlight is a sufficiently meterable source of magical energy, but needs a more balanced introduction to the target material.
astralsorcery.journal.INFUSER.3.text: By drawing from Liquid Starlight, no sky access is needed for a Starlight Infuser. The more volatile storage method of the liquid magic does mean partial losses of the liquid may be common when agitation is introduced during the Infusion process. The lost liquid must be replaced before the Infuser will allow subsequent activation for safety. Using a Resonating Wand will activate the Starlight Infuser much like other starlight crafting devices. <NL>The Academy has blocked these devices infusing creatures on ethical grounds.
astralsorcery.journal.ENCHANTMENT_AMULET: Shifting Stars normally resonate in chaotic and strange patterns, which allow them to disrupt personal attunements. This chaos can be halted when exposed to specially filtered Starlight. With the emanating power no longer constantly in flux, a more focused benefit can be achieved.<NL>Directing these energies into an Eye of Ender causes them to softly radiate and diffuse outwards a short distance, interacting with existing magical fields worn or held.

While worn, a Resplendent Prism adds or empowers magical effects applied to the rest of the wearer's equipment. Controlling this empowerment is not possible, and the effect is based entirely on the magical frequency the Shifting Star was locked into.<NL>Re-exposing a Resplendent Prism to filtered Starlight momentarily releases the frequency lock, with the uncontrollable chaos of the Shifting Star determining the magical results when it becomes set again.
astralsorcery.journal.RITUAL_LINK.1.text: The supporting structure for a Ritual Pedestal takes up not-inconsiderable space, an unfortunate necessity to channel starlight into a magical ritual. The Academy has devised a way to relocate the epicenter of the magical emanations from a ritual pedestal using a combination of linked anchors. By placing one anchor five meters above the pedestal, a Linking Tool can connect it to another anchor placed anywhere else in the same dimension. This will cause the linked Anchor to function like the pedestal itself, centering the magical ritual on itself.
Rather than drawing the passive Starlight power from glowstone and aquamarine or from the latent Fosic field, personal Attunement Charge can be used to create illuminating sparks when properly channeled. By combining dye with an Illumination Wand the color of the spark can be changed. Channeling Charge into a Cave Illuminator through this wand will also provide the Illuminator enough energy to run without nighttime Fosic strength or access to the sky for 10 seconds. When a Cave Illuminator is powered in this fashion, it will place sparks matching the wand's color.

Performing a shift-right-click on a block will channel enough Charge energy into the block to bridge the gap between the magically ethereal, and the real world. This will cause the block to take on the appearance of an ethereal ghost, tinted the color of the wand. By bridging existence in this fashion, the block is placed into ethereal stasis and will be unbreakable until shift-right-clicked again to bring it back fully into the real world, like magical bedrock. Any Illumination Wand can remove a block from this state, not only the one used to Illuminate it.
astralsorcery.journal.CHARGED_TOOLS.1.te: As crystalline tools already rely heavily on channeling passive Starlight for their function, they behave differently when Infused. Rather than transmuting their physical form, they instead have the natural magical pathways inside the crystals reinforced, allowing for far more direct and obvious magical effects when supplied outside magic. Feeding these tools with the natural Starlight Charge of the wielder will manifest this magic, but this will apply stresses to the crystals that requires a "cooldown" period before being repeated. Over time, the tool will use up its Infused
astralsorcery.journal.CHARGED_TOOLS.2.te: power, and require re-infusion. <NL>The magic manifested by this Charge energy relates directly to how the crystals were shaped in crafting the tool. Axes can harvest many connected parts of the struck tree at once, pickaxes can detect nearby ores despite intervening material, shovels can dig a broader hole at once, and weapons will unleash a burst of magical energy around their injured target that causes other nearby foes to also be injured.
astralsorcery.journal.TREEBEACON.1.text: Living matter is more receptive to Starlight than non-living matter, and new growth even more so. This is shown most-readily with plants, and the most reactive are those that grow the largest: trees. By tapping into that natural reactivity with a special magical beacon, a snapshot of the essence of the tree can be captured at the moment it grows from a sapling, expending the growth into an ethereal construct exemplifying the essence of that sapling. The sapling itself will be consumed to fuel the creation and image of this echo. By passing captured Starlight through this
astralsorcery.journal.TREEBEACON.3.text: echo, it may be extruded into real products of that tree. <NL>In this way, far more resources can be created magically from this echo than if the real tree were to be harvested. Focusing starlight into this beacon will accelerate how quickly the resources are generated, with Aevitas providing the most benefit. Foliage is least likely to be generated by the beacon, as it is furthest from the essence of each tree. <NL>While each beacon can support multiple echoes, each echo has a limited lifespan and will eventually break down, necessitating a new sapling.
astralsorcery.journal.node.PRISM.name: 水晶棱镜
astralsorcery.journal.PRISM.1.text: While crystal lenses form the backbone of any distributed starlight network, they can only transmit to a single location at once, which limits distribution. The Crystal Prism solves this, though at a much greater material cost. The same principles behind crafting Crystal Lenses apply here, with the crystal used as the heart of the prism dictating the transmissive qualities of the prism. A crystal prism will evenly distribute and Starlight it received from a collector to all its target links.
astralsorcery.journal.DRAWING_TABLE.1.te: 通过一些流俗的知识对物品进行附魔，这一过程确实有些不太精确。利用星座特性以及星光聚焦，我可以获得一些比通常情况更为强大的附魔组合。<NL>在此我们需要用到一种特制的蚀刻玻璃板。<NL>在天空中出现了足够多星座的情况下，群星映射台最多一次性可以利用三个星座的力量。
astralsorcery.journal.DRAWING_TABLE.3.te: 如何放置星座图案的轨迹，这一问题十分的重要，因为星体之间的连接若直接穿过了其他星座，星座之间就会产生相互干扰，致使整体映射的强度降低。若想达到最好的效果，让星座间共享某个星点是较好的选择。<NL>星座轨迹必须放置在一种具有星光反应性的羊皮纸上，放置好的轨迹将会用于指导下一步的玻璃蚀刻，记得提前准备好这种玻璃。<NL>学院提醒各位，重复的在羊皮纸或在蚀刻玻璃上使用同一个星座，并不会增强最终的产物，而且考虑到星座之间的相互干扰，最后很有可能反倒是削减了最终产物的强度。
astralsorcery.journal.DRAWING_TABLE.4.te: 蚀刻玻璃制成后，若是玻璃上蚀刻的星座此时正高悬于天空，它便可以直接附魔那些未被附魔的装备以及书，<NL>通过这种方法，那些在通常情况下互斥的附魔如今可以相安并存，并且附魔出来的物品要比通常情况更为强大。若是用书来进行附魔，如此产生的附魔书并不包含着星座赐予物品的所有力量。
astralsorcery.journal.DRAWING_TABLE.6.te: 附魔的精华同样也可以灌注到水瓶，平凡，浓稠，或者是粗制的药水中，并酿造出星之酿——这是一种神奇的药水，它可以为饮用者提供短时间的魔法效果，具体的效果则取决于蚀刻的星座。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ALTAR4.name: 五彩祭坛
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR4.1.text: The final test for any initiate to graduate the Academy as an Astral Sorcerer is to complete construction of an Iridescent Altar - the most advanced method of Starlight Crafting presently known. Brute force will only succeed for so long with magic before a more deft hand is needed to prevent disaster. <NL>By filtering received Starlight through an Attuned Crystal socketed into the altar, the influence of only a single constellation can be applied to the crafted item without risking a rapid and catastrophic unplanned disassembly.
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR4.4.text: To make the most use of this filtered magic approach, Astral Relays can be placed on any sooty marble of the altar structure. These will allow for specific items to be placed during the crafting process when requested by the altar, so their essence may be infused into the crafted item. <NL>These items will show in the crafting recipe as orbiting the outside of the crafting grid, and any required Attuned Crystal will show in the background of the recipe image.
astralsorcery.journal.COLL_CRYSTAL.1.tex: Attuned Rock Crystals serve as good filters for Starlight, but only have the same receptivity as any other block. By using a Celestial Altar to apply a coating of several substances that are more receptive to Starlight, this receptivity can be greatly enhanced. The Collector Crystal crafted in this fashion will gather all Starlight within 8 meters of itself, discarding the light that does not match its Attunement.
astralsorcery.journal.COLL_CRYSTAL.3.tex: These Crystals operate like the ones in the Academy-provided study temples and can be used in the same fashion, but with the ability to move them for convenience. Due to the reach of each crystal, placing them too closely together will see diminishing returns in total gathered starlight. <NL>For best performance, care should be taken in selecting the qualities of the crystal used to craft these Collectors, as once crafted, they cannot be changed.
astralsorcery.journal.CEL_CRYSTAL_GROW.1: Studies into the internal structure of Rock Crystals show that there are limits to how large they can grow along with limits to their qualities. Purified iron is weaker than when adding some carbon to make steel, and in the same fashion Rock Crystals need an introduced impurity to alter their internal structure for superior performance. <NL>Stardust is this impurity, but a magical crucible is needed to bring this change to bloom, though it is a two-step process.
astralsorcery.journal.CEL_CRYSTAL_GROW.2: Submerging a Rock Crystal into a bucket of Liquid Starlight with a handful of Stardust will see a rapid boil occur in the mixture. Once the Liquid Starlight and excess Stardust have boiled off, what remains will be a new crystal growth. Exposure to Starlight from the sky above or from a linked Collector Crystal will result in this crystal cluster change its internal structure, growing over time in several visible stages. <NL>Harvesting the cluster will see more attributes on the resulting crystal than it started with.
astralsorcery.journal.CEL_CRYSTAL_GROW.3: It is recommended to have the cluster grow on a block of Starmetal Ore for several reasons. The magical radiation of the ore will generate sympathetic magical eddies in the crystal that accelerate the growth process, though each stage of growth will disrupt the ore's magical field sufficiently to revert it to iron ore. The Academy recommends having a nearby Collector to transmute the ore again each time this occurs.
astralsorcery.journal.CEL_CRYSTALS.1.tex: Celestial-class crystals are superior in many qualities to a normal Rock Crystal, and can be easily identified by their brilliant blue color resulting from the inclusion of Stardust. <NL>In any instance where a Rock Crystal could be used, a Celestial Crystal could be substituted, including the creation of Crystal Clusters with slightly different attributes. Some advanced applications require the superior structure of a Celestial Crystal.
astralsorcery.journal.ENHANCED_COLLECTOR: Celestial Crystals create superior Celestial Collector Crystals, but the wax and wane of a constellation over the world does not change. Celestial Collector Crystals can be supported by a structure that evens out the ebb and flow of this energy. While the Collector won't provide as much Starlight when its constellation is in the sky, it will provide much more when its constellation is not in the sky, allowing Rituals and Transmutations to run when they otherwise would be greatly slowed.
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_TRAIT.1.text: The light from the Faint constellations is insufficient to fuel rituals or fully Attune a crystal, but it is sufficient for enchanting items or creating Stardew. The spectrum of their energies is sufficient to alter other crystal Attunements. Setting relays in the proper form for these constellations on an Attunement Altar allows an already Attuned crystal to have a single Trait applied that modifies its Starlight channeling.
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_TRAIT.2.text: Once a trait has been applied to an Attuned crystal, it cannot be changed. <NL>Collectors crafted from a crystal with a Trait will retain the trait, but it will have no effect on the starlight filtered. <NL>Additional information about the effect of each of these Traits has been added to the Faint constellations in the Constellations tab.
astralsorcery.journal.OBSERVATORY.1.text: To increase visual reach into the stars, more filtered lenses and reactive powders will be needed than the Telescope required. The more sensitive viewing an Observatory offers allows a Sorcerer to delve deep into the skyfield, following the slightest hint of magical energies back to its source constellation. <NL>In the deep depths of the Astral, more constellations faintly shine their magical power forth, barely distinguishable against the background noise of existence.
astralsorcery.journal.OBSERVATORY.3.text: As the Observatory is very precise, scrolling move moving the mouse is needed to aim around the night sky. When a prospective constellation is located, holding shift will lock the view, allowing the constellation to be traced. Right-click to leave the Observatory view screen, and dismount the observatory chair by pressing shift.
Shifting Stars are well suited to brute-force disruption of a personal Attunement, but more refined methods exist. <NL>Filtering the light used for crafting and adding aspects from items allows an advanced Star to be crafted that modulates Attunement energies instead of disrupting them to failure. The Attunement root will shift to match the Irradiant Star, and all perk points will be deallocated, but any growth progress will not be reverted. This allows the sorcerer to re-allocate those points without loss of level.
astralsorcery.journal.CRAFTING_FOCUS_HIN: 随着五彩祭坛的制作完成，我们很高兴的看到你已经成为了一名成熟的星术师。现在，新的世界正等待着你去研究探索，只是这一次你得孤身上路了。以往学院通过宝典而对你施加的你与学院图书馆之间的安全措施，现在已经全部移除。此外，你现在也可以学习之前宝典中被禁止的知识，这是作为你毕业之后对学院知识储备作出贡献的嘉奖。
利用五彩祭坛进行星光合成，若出现了可用星光量不足以维系合成进行的情况，例如黎明时刻的星光量下降，五彩祭坛并不会退出当前的这一合成，而是会持续处于激活状态，直到星光量重新回到需求水平之后继续进行合成，无论你用的是什么方法进行星光量恢复都可以。<NL>你现在也可以制作替换用的或额外的星图了。
在解禁的知识中，有一部分内容是所有知识中最危险的，其中包括通过星图去发现天空中朦胧级别的星座的相关知识，这些星座无法通过肉眼看见，必须依赖于瞭望台的辅助，方可一揭它们的真面目。学院建议你，在研究这些朦胧星座的时候千万要小心，因为它们的表现会与你根据之前的星辉机制而推导出的预期结果大相径庭。<NL>——星辉学院全体教职员工。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ATT_CAPE.name: 星斗披风
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_CAPE.1.text: 在个人防护这一领域，魔法和科技争相辉映，有着各自令世人感叹的伟大创造，但遍数其间，无一样能够引导星之力。取星尘与共振宝石些许，深层灌注于皮革盔甲之中，这件由皮革与金属制造的披风便制成了，它既能保护穿戴者，亦能引导星光积蓄于其内。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_CAPE.3.text: 披风的魔法敏感性极高，因此有着极强的附魔能力。<NL>披风有着自己的星光积蓄槽，这意味着它无法通过共鸣祭坛与星座进行共鸣，而是需要通过一种特殊的合成操作才能完成与星座的共鸣。<NL>只有满耐久的披风方可进行共鸣合成。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_CAPE.4.text: 披风一次只能共鸣于一个星座。在共鸣合成中使用已经共鸣过的披风，只会改变原先披风的共鸣星座。<NL>披风可以通过常规的方式进行修复，使用星尘作为修复原料即可。<NL>在星座页面中列举出了各个星座的共鸣配方。
astralsorcery.journal.C_CHALICE.1.text: 聚星缸的最大缺点便是它的储蓄槽太小。用来给催化剂产生液体还算足够，While sufficient for generating liquids from a catalyst, the required design becomes prohibitively large when scaled up for greater storage. Pipes that can draw liquid from below the Lightwell may not be available, or the environment may not support their use. <NL>Magical teleportation of the fluid is the solution.
astralsorcery.journal.C_CHALICE.3.text: Using Resonating Gems to keep the contents under high compression results in 64 buckets of storage in a small space. This also means that relocating a Chalice without first removing the stored fluid will result in the fluid being dispersed into the ether.<NL>The Chalice is able to draw Liquid Starlight through the ether from Lightwells within 16 meters it has Line-of-Sight with. Like the Lightwell, a Chalice can be connected to pipes from the bottom face.
astralsorcery.journal.C_CHALICE.4.text: As the Chalice facilitates magical transport from Lightwells, the essence of any fluid contained within may leak, seeking out other fluidic essence to merge with. This results in the creation of materials as though the two fluids had met in the world, though very slight dissipation of the stored fluid can occur when this happens. <NL>An active redstone signal disables both of these features.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_CORE.1.text: Liquid Starlight may store Starlight energy in a condensed and manageable form, but it is easy to unleash that same power again. Through use of a magical centrifuge, a chaotic fountain of Starlight can be spun up for times when raw brute magical force are needed to accomplish a goal. <NL>The containment ring of an Evershifting Fountain serves as a stable focus for these energies, and any blocks left within the structure are likely to be destroyed
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_CORE.3.text: No view of the sky is needed to operate this device, as it is operated by an internal storage reservoir of Liquid Starlight. Safely feeding Liquid Starlight into this reservoir is performed by placing a Chalice directly on top of the Fountain. <NL>The desired magic must first be §5Primed§r for this power to have any effect.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_HEAD_LIQUID.1: Eons of fluidic essence trickling into the void from above bedrock means there are vast, untapped oceans of fluid ripe for retrieval. Using the affinity of Octans for this fluidic essence allows this Prime to draw it to the surface. <NL>Powering a Neromantic Prime will result in a highly destructive bore comprised of Starlight energy burning a hole down to bedrock, at which point the energy reacts with the bedrock to reach into the fluidic essence oceans in the ethereal below, dragging it back to the Fountain.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_HEAD_LIQUID.3: Retrieval of liquids harvested in this way requires an empty Chalice with Line-of-Sight to the Fountain. <NL>The majority of fluidic essence available is water, though when other reservoirs of essence in the area are exhausted by the Prime, water essence will fill the gap left behind. <NL>An §1Ichosic Resonator§r should be used to scout fluid locations in advance.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_HEAD_LIQUID.4: 由于无法确定地下到底蕴藏的是哪种流体精华，考虑到不断的转移万象泉结构实在是令人烦躁，而且还有节约珍贵的星光液资源。为此我对法斯刻共振器进行了修改，让其拥有对大面积区域的流体信息采样的能力。<NL>改进型的艾克斯共振器仍然只能在夜间使用，它借用了共振宝石的力量与流体进行共鸣。新的艾克斯共振器和旧的法斯刻共振器可以通过 shift 右击切换模式。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ICHOSIC.name: 艾克斯共振器
astralsorcery.journal.ICHOSIC.1.text: Moving a Neromantic Prime Fountain structure constantly to determine what fluidic essence lies below is inefficient of effort and time. With some minor changes, the Fosic Resonator can be used to sample this information instead. Leveraging Resonating Gems and Stardust, holding the Ichosic Resonator at night will draw forth plumes of fluidic essence. <NL>Shifting modes between Fosic and Ichosic can be accomplished by shift-right-clicking.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_HEAD_VORTEX.1: Tapping Vicio for movement allows this Prime to draw close any creatures nearby, trapping them in a vortical current of Starlight. These trapped creatures remain unable to act or defend themselves while so trapped, for as long as Liquid Starlight is fed to the Fountain. <NL>The cost in Starlight to restrain a creature is influenced by the strength of that creature to fight against the vortical currents.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_HEAD_VORTEX.3: Even mythical creatures are capable of being held by this Prime, though it seems to require its full and focused power to do so. These creatures require more Starlight power than a Chalice is able to consistently feed into a Fountain over time. Certain creatures, like the Wither or Ender Dragon, may only be contained until the internal reservoir runs dry.
astralsorcery.journal.recipe.removalinfo: §c此合成已在当前的整合包内移除！请通过其他信息来源查找合成方式！
astralsorcery.journal.recipe.constellati: 需要与 %s 星座进行聚焦
astralsorcery.journal.recipe.infusion.mu: Can consume more than one liquid pool
astralsorcery.journal.recipe.infusion.no: Does not accept input from chalices
astralsorcery.journal.recipe.infusion.co: 将输入的数据复制到输出
crystal.property.astralsorcery.size.name: 尺寸
astralsorcery.constellation.discidia.des: Light from this constellation penetrates, piercing to the heart of both materials and creatures alike.
astralsorcery.constellation.discidia.enc: This constellation saturates potions to grant heavily increased strength to the imbiber. Weapons may be enchanted with great Power, Sharpness, and can encourage tridents to Channel storms.<NL>An enchanted weapon's overall damage may also be increased. Armor enchanted by Discidia may increase critical hit chance.
astralsorcery.constellation.discidia.rit: Dispersing of this light into small discordant energies in the area creates a damaging field, lashing out at all enemies nearby. The intensity increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.discidia.man: Once infused with this Constellation's light, a mantle will draw strength from your enemies' blows, empowering your own against them. The wearer gains the same amount of damage most recently taken as additional damage channeled into each hit.
astralsorcery.constellation.discidia.cor: An offensive weapon empowers foes. Allies will find themselves wounded, and enemies will be rapidly healed of damage and become resistant to new wounds.
astralsorcery.constellation.armara.descr: A repulsive force comes from the light of this constellation, similar to a shield or protective barrier.
astralsorcery.constellation.armara.encha: This constellation saturates potions to grant Resistance to harm. Armor may have heavy magical Protection enchanted onto it.<NL>Armor may also be thickened beyond it's normal magical improvements. Weapons enchanted may improve a wielder's ability to dodge incoming blows.
astralsorcery.constellation.armara.ritua: Dispersing this light into a protective barrier reflects projectiles, pushes mobs outside its reach, and makes allies more resilient to damage. The frequency increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.armara.mantl: A mantle infused with this Constellation's light will draw from the wearer to slowly store up to three magical charges over a minute, each negating one damaging attack.
astralsorcery.constellation.armara.corru: Protection is turned to assault, with previously repelled creatures now empowered in Speed, Strength, and Resistance.
astralsorcery.constellation.vicio.descri: Bathing in the rays of this constellation gives the appearance that everything is moving slower, when it simply makes you faster in whatever you do.
astralsorcery.constellation.vicio.enchan: This constellation saturates potions to grant greatly increased movement Speed. Boots can be enchanted to reduce falling damage, and tridents can Rip the wielder from the ground, crossing great distances quickly.<NL>Weapon attack speed may be increased, and boots may improve movement speed.
astralsorcery.constellation.vicio.ritual: The light of this constellation bestows flight within its area. The maximum reach and frequency of the flight refresh greatly increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.vicio.mantle: This mantle infusion grants flight like an elytra, but with greater speed and no decay to the mantle for improved function.
astralsorcery.constellation.vicio.corrup: The very air turns against those inside, with flight disabled and great Slowness and Fatigue inflicted.
astralsorcery.constellation.aevitas.desc: Exposure to focused light of this Constellation will cause life nearby to flourish and greatly increase its bounty.
astralsorcery.constellation.aevitas.ench: This constellation saturates potions to grant Regeneration. Enchanting Armor and tools will let them magically Mend themselves of damage.<NL>Enchanted armor may also improve the wearers health, and enchanted weapons may leech life from their foes.
astralsorcery.constellation.aevitas.ritu: The ritual suffuses the area with an invigorated lifeforce - a nearby living creature experiences Regeneration, while a nearby crop grows at an accelerated rate. How frequently this occurs increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.aevitas.mant: Bathed in the power of creation, wearing this mantle recovers lost hunger and brings healing. Walking off of blocks causes the mantle to hold you aloft on an invisible platform formed of Starlight.
astralsorcery.constellation.aevitas.corr: The light of creation turns to decay, with living creatures sapped of life and strength, and plants disintegrating into dust.
astralsorcery.constellation.evorsio.desc: The light of this constellation can shatter its way through materials and objects.
astralsorcery.constellation.evorsio.ench: This constellation saturates potions to grant increased mining and attack Haste. Enchanted tools improve their Efficiency of use.<NL>Additionally, digging tools may see improved speed when harvesting their targeted blocks.
astralsorcery.constellation.evorsio.ritu: Dispersing this constellation's light with a ritual causes thorough destruction, breaking any solid blocks except those that cannot be broken. How quickly a block is broken increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.evorsio.mant: This mantle enhances your destructive potential, allowing you to break planes of blocks at once.
astralsorcery.constellation.evorsio.corr: Destruction turns to creation, with the air becoming dirt, stone, or sometimes ores.
astralsorcery.constellation.mineralis.de: Standing in the light of this constellation, the very stone of the world glows strangely and its shape changes over time.
astralsorcery.constellation.mineralis.en: This constellation saturates potions to grant increased mining and attack Haste. Enchanted tools will bring their wielder improved Fortune.<NL>Additionally, enchanted armor may improve tool efficiency, and digging tools may affect a larger area.
astralsorcery.constellation.mineralis.ri: The light of this constellation transmutes ordinary stone into valuable minerals in a wide area. How frequently this transmutation occurs increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.mineralis.ma: A mantle infused with this constellation finds itself drawn to sought materials, where holding blocks in either hand will show them within 20 meters despite obstruction.
astralsorcery.constellation.mineralis.co: Lucrative mineralization becomes obstructive, and air turns to chunks of stone beneath the walker.
astralsorcery.constellation.lucerna.desc: The light of this constellation seems immensely bright despite it being far away. Bright enough that it may trick some into thinking it day.
astralsorcery.constellation.lucerna.ench: This constellation saturates potions to grant the ability to see in the dark. Helmets can be enchanted to have this same effect.<NL>Armor enchanted by Lucerna may increase a wearer's maximum Starlight Charge, and weapons and tools may improve Starlight Charge regeneration.
astralsorcery.constellation.lucerna.ritu: While only Starlight, the fundamental brightness contained within the area of the ritual prevents creatures arising from darkness in the area; unless they have a strong malicious intent. The reach of the ritual increases based on the number of balancing lenses active on the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.lucerna.mant: This mantle reveals all creatures, spawners and containers within 3 dozen paces, even through walls.
astralsorcery.constellation.lucerna.corr: Light is stretched, and the time of Starlight lasts far longer.
astralsorcery.constellation.horologium.d: This constellation shifts in time, only showing during significant astral occurences. Its light  twists time, accelerating things they shine upon.
astralsorcery.constellation.horologium.e: This constellation saturates potions to grant increased movement Speed, action Haste, and greatly increased Luck. Enchanted weapons greatly tend to find hidden Loot in slain foes, and tools may bring great Fortune to their user.<NL>Enchanted tools and weapons may find themselves faster to re-use, helmets may improve perk XP gain, and armor may improve the strength of perks.
astralsorcery.constellation.horologium.r: This ritual accelerates mechanical and ticking blocks, with nearby blocks ticking their own clock at an increased rate. How quickly a clock advances for any block is based on the amount of Starlight channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.horologium.m: Wearers of a mantle attuned to time can freeze all hostiles nearby when attacked for a short period of time. There is a delay before time can be so abruptly disturbed again. Fire does not trigger this mantle effect.
astralsorcery.constellation.horologium.c: Time slows and stops for nearby creatures.
astralsorcery.constellation.octans.descr: 星光照拂，周围的水开始缓慢轻柔的泛起泡泡，海洋生物的种类也逐渐丰富起来。
astralsorcery.constellation.octans.encha: 被这一星座渗染的药水，可让使用者在海底呼吸，以及看得更为清楚。附魔头盔则可以加长你的屏息时间。<NL>附魔后的盔甲可以提升你的游泳速度。
astralsorcery.constellation.octans.ritua: 这一星座的光芒可以让你在钓鱼时收获满满，并将水里的鱼和其他物品拉扯到水面上。产生收获的频率取决于引导至效应放大器的星光量。
astralsorcery.constellation.octans.mantl: 注入了此星座之力量的披风，可以让你在水中畅游无阻，与在空气中一样不费力。并且在水中使用工具以及武器时，水对你不会产生任何影响。
astralsorcery.constellation.octans.corru: The ocean rebels, with a sea forming around the pedestal, a violent deluge of fish falling from the sky, and other nearby liquids drying to sand.
astralsorcery.constellation.bootes.descr: 它的光芒让动物们身体强健，心情愉悦。
astralsorcery.constellation.bootes.encha: 被这一星座渗染的药水，会让使用者餍足于饥饿。附魔工具挖掘方块如丝绸般轻柔，三叉戟则更为忠诚于自己的投掷者。<NL>附魔过的盔甲会增加穿戴者的生命值，近战武器则可以在更远的地方攻击到敌人。
astralsorcery.constellation.bootes.ritua: 沐浴于星座辉光之下的牲畜们，舒适放松且乐于繁殖，并且还会神奇的掉落自身的资源。生效频率取决于引导至效应放大器的星光量。
astralsorcery.constellation.bootes.mantl: 穿戴着与这一星座共鸣的披风，会召唤出三只跟随并与你并肩战斗的耀斑。
astralsorcery.constellation.bootes.corru: 对动物的关照变为了屠戮，位于生效范围内的生物会被宰杀一空，同时还会掉落巨量的资源。
astralsorcery.constellation.fornax.descr: 天炉座之光自天垂落，伴随着强而猛烈的高温。
astralsorcery.constellation.fornax.encha: 被这一星座渗染的药水，会让使用者对火焰伤害免疫。附魔武器会点燃被攻击者，工具则会自动冶炼被挖掘的方块。<NL>附魔后的武器更容易打出暴击。附魔后的盔甲会增强暴击所造成的伤害。
astralsorcery.constellation.fornax.ritua: 星座之能量弥漫渗透，阻止区域内所有的火焰生成，但因星座自身的高温，区域内的普通方块会被烧炼，或者被简单的化为灰烬。燃烧速度取决于引导至效应放大器的星光量。
astralsorcery.constellation.fornax.mantl: 穿上这件披风，一部分的火焰伤害会转变为你的生命值。
astralsorcery.constellation.fornax.corru: 区域内的热量迅速散逸，流体冻结，火焰熄灭，潮湿之气凝为固体。
astralsorcery.constellation.pelotrio.des: 只有在最黑暗或是最明亮的夜晚，才能看到由这一星座发出的那不可抵御的超自然光束。
astralsorcery.constellation.pelotrio.enc: 被这一星座渗染的药水，会让使用者获得增强版本的生命恢复以及伤害吸收效果。附魔的钓竿则对鱼儿们有着非一般的吸引，弓则不会耗尽自己的弹药。<NL>附魔后的盔甲可以延长你所喝下的药水的效果持续时间，同时也会增加你闪避攻击的几率。
astralsorcery.constellation.pelotrio.rit: 星座的光芒浸于此处，生命会无视圣芒座对周边的影响而不断被召唤而出。召唤的频率取决于引导至效应放大器的星光量。
astralsorcery.constellation.pelotrio.man: 与此星座共鸣的星斗披风，会在使用星光的过程中将星光表现为自动使用的工具或武器，会在穿戴者用镐子破坏方块，用斧子砍树，以及使用武器攻击敌人时进行行为模仿。
astralsorcery.constellation.pelotrio.cor: 其内蠢蠢欲动的黑暗，将从周围的生物中爆发出来，他们会转变为更为可怕的形态。这些生物会在死后掉落更多的战利品。
astralsorcery.constellation.gelu.descrip: 星界深处的寒冷，与这一星座的超自然之力不谋而合。
astralsorcery.constellation.gelu.enchant: 被这一星座渗染的药水，会让使用者获得对火焰伤害的抗性，但同时也会让使用者行动迟缓。附魔的靴子则可以冻结你走过的水面，并能降低摔落伤害。附魔的物品则更难因使用而损坏。<NL>附魔过后的盔甲会增加附加在其上的魔咒的效力，挖掘工具的触及距离会变得更长，武器则更有可能打出强力的暴击。
astralsorcery.constellation.gelu.trait: 阴寒阵阵，效果的输出因此而降低，并且带着刺骨的寒意，但却也因此扩大了水晶石的作用范围。效应放大器的作用范围提升到了原先的四倍，但效果削弱至原先的六分之一。
astralsorcery.constellation.ulteria.desc: 即使这星座之光芒早已跨越了如此漫长遥远的距离，却仍然持久而恒定，就如同一位不可被阻挡的超凡存在。
astralsorcery.constellation.ulteria.ench: 被这一星座渗染的药水，会让使用者获得极强的伤害吸收以及生命恢复效果，而代价则是对自身进攻之力的削弱。附魔的物品则在使用中不那么容易损坏，附魔的盔甲则可以神奇的减轻火焰，弹射物，以及爆炸带来的伤害。<NL>附魔过后的盔甲还可以减轻元素伤害，近战武器可以反弹伤害至攻击者，远程武器则会提升你躲避攻击的能力。
astralsorcery.constellation.ulteria.trai: 抽取效应放大器的能量，它可以将放大器的效果提升四倍，但范围缩减至原先的五分之一。
astralsorcery.constellation.alcara.descr: 宇宙中，万事万事都处于其自身精巧而微妙的和谐之中。这一星座的光芒能够改变事物的振频，将其扭转为它的相反形态。
astralsorcery.constellation.alcara.encha: 被这一星座渗染的药水，会让使用者变得无比的幸运，同时还会增加使用者的速度，并使其隐形。附魔钓竿与原先的相比，在各方面都有了加强，附魔工具在采掘时会更加轻柔，附魔的剑则可以对敌人的盟友造成毁灭性打击，附魔弩的装填时间缩短了很多。 <NL>附魔过后的盔甲会增加穿戴者的无人能挡持续时间，近战武器有可能对目标施加流血效果，弹射物则能飞得更快。
astralsorcery.constellation.alcara.trait: 与此星座共鸣的水晶石，在使用时会变得尤为脆弱，他们的效力也会变得杂乱而堕反。水晶石的具体效果取决于它的基础共鸣星座。
astralsorcery.constellation.vorux.descri: 即便位于浩瀚星界的深处，它的光芒仍能激起人们的愤怒以及破坏欲。
astralsorcery.constellation.vorux.enchan: 被这一星座渗染的药水，会让使用者的力量以及对伤害的抗性得到增加，而代价则是无法遏制的肌肉疲软。被其附魔的武器，乃是为敌人鸣响的丧钟，附魔的弩则可以穿透盾牌以及敌人，盾牌不再是安全之所。<NL>附魔盔甲则可以提升穿戴者的移动速度。
astralsorcery.constellation.vorux.trait: 将鱼一次性捕完固然可以获得更多收益，但在之后便无鱼可捕了。效应放大器的效应强度和范围近乎扩增了两倍，但水晶石的碎裂几率更高了。
